column1: full, 129kph, swinging into leg, he pushes a drive back to the bowler
charges and moves leg side, it's angled across him without swing and Lynn reaches but misses
128kph good length shaping back to the right hander, he defends to midwicket
edged and there's no slip! 132kph, back of a length, angled across him, it's too tight to cut but he tries and gets a thick edge that would have gone straight to first slip but there is no one there!
magnificent off drive! Full, no swing, Lynn got a little stride forward with a weight shift and laced it wide of mid off
full outside off, he pins the ears back and smashes a drive straight to cover. He hit that incredibly hard. Two metres either side and it was four
tossed up on off, he leans forward and defends
short, drifting into the hip, he tucks this through square leg to the sweeper
drifting into middle, he defends cautiously on the front foot
full, angled into middle and leg, he stays leg side and checks a drive to mid off
tossed up, he tries to loft over mid off but drags it to long on for one
late cut off the toe of the bat runs away! Good length but fractionally wide, he sat back and late cut, it came off the toe of the bat and runs away fine of short third man
back of a length, 130kph, top of off, he defends to cover who is one the circle and they pinch one
beaten by a 133kph, good length delivery that doesn't swing and beats the edge with the angle
back of a length fourth stump, 132kph, he pushes with a vertical bat to backward point
slashed over backward point! A wide half volley, he cleared the front leg, reached out and sliced it up and over backward point and it went all the way
flicked over wide fine leg! A length ball on leg in the slot, he swung hard and launched it over wide fine leg into the crowd
full, 130kph, he drives on the up to mid off, Prestwidge misfields on the circle and they get two
drifting into middle and leg, he defends off a thick inside edge through forward square
back of a length, top of leg, no turn, he's back and defending to midwicket
drifting down leg, Lynn stays leg side and works this off his pads to deep forward square
drifting into leg, he pushes off the back foot to midwicket and Prestwidge misfields again to allow one
shorter outside off, he cuts firmly to point
drifting outside leg, cramping Lynn as he backed away, he gets an inside edge onto pad and it rolls behind him
130kph, back of a length on off, he defends to midwicket and they pinch one

Webster lets it go through his legs at long on! Lynn lofted this straight, it was a miscue, Webster got around easily and completely missed as he tried to pick up and throw. It went through his legs for four
back of a length, outside off, he cracks this on the up to deep cover-point
sliced up and over point! Full and wide of off, he tried to loft over cover but sliced it high behind point and it found the gap
good length, top of off, he defends with soft hands to cover-point for one
charges and slaps this past cover! Shorter wide of off, he advanced and moved leg side to free his arms and he smoked it along the ground past cover and deep point had no chance
drifting into middle, 91kph, he stays back and gets a thick inside edge onto pad
full on off, he drives firmly to long off
back of a length, on off, he backs away and thrashes this straight to Marsh at cover
lofted over midwicket into the gap! Darted into leg, he backs away to give room and swings this with the bottom hand over midwicket and into the gap
fired further down leg, he sweeps fine, Harvey has a long chase from deep square and makes a superb diving save but he knocked it too far away to go and get it and they run four
full outside off, he drives firmly to long off
shorter into the hip, he tucks this behind square to the man in the deep
good length, top of off, he's back and defending awkwardly off a thick inside edge
glorious cover drive! Full but wide and Bryant makes a superb stride out and crunches a drive powerfully forward of deep square
better length, darted into middle and leg, he gets a thick inside edge onto pad
shorter length, he's back and forcing this to deep point
97kph, sliding into leg, he's back and defending
nearly bowled him! Short length, he tried to drive off the back foot, got a thick inside edge onto his foot and it nearly rolled onto the stumps! They pinched a run
tries to launch a length ball over midwicket, completely miscues but it lands safe short of long on
full into leg, he clips this firmly to deep midwicket
141kph, length ball, he tries to heave this over midwicket and drags a thick inside edge to deep square leg
pulled powerfully through midwicket! Fractionally short outside off, he picked the length and crunched it flat through midwicket
shorter length outside off, he tries to upper cut but misses
clubbed over cover! Lynn reaches his 50 from 29 balls. It was full outside off and he cleared the front leg and clubbed it over cover. He didn't middle it but got enough of it
holes out to deep midwicket! 130kph, good length outside off, it was in the slot, he swung hard but got it off the toe of the bat and it carried all the way to the man on the rope. Easy catch
132kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working this to midwicket
caught behind! Two in an over! Back of a length, fifth stump line, maybe a touch close to cut, he gets a thick edge and Harper moves easily to right to take the catch
back of a length, 132kph, on off, he rises onto his toes and defends
131kph, good length, top of off, he defends on the front foot
angled down leg, he paddles this fine for a couple
full toss wide of off, he square drives to deep point
full on leg, he clips this off his toes through forward square
shorter length, he's back and cutting to point
full toss hammered up and over cover! A bad ball from the part-timer and he picked his spot and slapped it over cover
good length, fourth stump, he defends to backward point
back of a length wide of off, he cuts hard to deep point
135kph, bouncer outside off, Labuschagne shapes to pull and bails out
fuller outside off, 119kph, slower ball, he drives and mistimes it, dragging it to midwicket
120kph, slower ball on middle, he backs away and delicately opens the face of the bat to glide it fine of third man
shorter length outside off, he tries to cut and chops this into the off side
full and wide, 123kph, he square drives firmly to deep point
slower ball outside off, 103kph, Labuschagne picks it and places it to the gap at midwicket for a well judged two
half volley, 123kph, he drives to long off
slower ball on off, 108kph, he's back and tucking this behind square
full outside off, he clears the front leg and hammers a drive straight to cover

Webster fumbles as Denly's bat got stuck! He would have been run out! Labuschagne drives wide of long off and they take on Prestwidge's through for two, Denly tries to slide his bat on the soft surface next to the drop in but his bat got stuck! Webster just needed to take it cleanly but he dropped it!

Stumped! By a mile! Slower and drifting in a long way, Denly advances and tried to loft over midwicket, it goes through the gate between bat and pad, Harper moves nicely down leg and takes it very neatly to complete the stumping
shorter outside off, very short, it nearly bounces twice as he cuts to deep point
driven firmly to wide long off, they take on the left hander Shaun Marsh and get two easily
darted in outside leg, he's stays leg side and punches this to deep cover
shorter on leg, he stands up and forces off the back foot to long on
83kph, wide of off, he square drives on the up to deep point
fuller on middle, 123kph, he cracks a drive on the up to long on
slower ball, 113kph, he square drives nicely behind point and it's well placed for two
back of a length outside off, 127kph, he drives off the back foot to point
full and wide, 124kph, he hammers a square drive to deep point
slower ball on off, he drives neatly to long off
full and wide, he square drives to deep point
136kph, good length outside off, he drives on the up past cover and they get a couple

an appeal for caught behind given not out. Slower ball outside off, he shaped to paddle fine initially and tried to open the face to run to third man, it missed the bat and brushed the back pad on the way through to the keeper
shorter length pulled through square leg
back of a length wide of off, he pushes this to point
slower ball, 120kph, top of leg, he tucks this to square leg
117kph, shorter slower ball, he pulls to deep square
98kph, drifting into Labuschagne who backs away and he's cramped, chopping it onto the pitch
full outside off, he hammers this straight to cover
backs away and tries to heave to midwicket but mistimes it for one

bowled off the pads! Burns set himself outside leg, it drifts into the pads, he tried to whip but hit his back pad with his bat and couldn't access the ball, it hit the pads and ricocheted onto the stumps
shorter, 98kph, top of middle, he's back and forcing this to long on
slog sweep over square leg and it finds the rope! Too full on leg, he got down on one knee, he didn't nail it but got it in the gap
drifting into middle, he's backing away but gets a thick inside edge onto pad
backs away again, it's darted into cramp him and he punches back to the bowler
Should have been run out! It was hit straight to cover and they ran, Finch had one stump to aim at but plenty of time and he missed
fired down the leg side as Labuschagne stand still
charges at a 97kph length ball and swing hard but gets it along the ground to long on
drilled wide of mid off! Full toss outside off, he hammers this free hit wide of the man at mid off to release some pressure
darted into leg stump, he swings this behind square to the man in the deep
full on middle, he stays leg side and drives to long off
full on off, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
swept cleverly past short fine! Drifting down leg but instead of backing away, he finally stays still and sweeps this with the angle past short fine
short outside off, he cuts hard and gets a thick edge that runs fine of short third man, Lalor has a long chase but he does well
drifting into leg, he swings hard and is beaten on the inside edge and it just misses leg, Harper fumbles and they get a bye
powerful slog sweep over deep midwicket! Full in the slot, he is down on one knee to launch over deep midwicket! Good shot
length ball, 132kph, outside off, he swings hard across the line dragging it to deep forward square
paddle scooped over fine leg! Superb shot. He stepped inside the line, he premeditated it, Evans dug it short, Labuschagne adjusted, stood up and flicked it over fine leg!

attempted it again and spooned it to short fine leg! Evans out foxed him with a 117kph, slower ball as Labuschagne shaped to paddle scoop him again, he mistimed it off the sticker of the bat and it just popped up to short fine. Easy catch
133kph, banged in, Gregory charged and tried to swat it through midwicket but gets a thick bottom edge that bounces short of the keeper
charges and whips it behind square! Evans followed him with a 107kph slower ball, but Gregory clipped it behind square and Finch on the fence couldn't cut it off
120kph, short ball, he tries to pull, spoons a top edge high to mid on but it lands safely as long on is back and they pinch two
107kph, slower ball, he tries to pull but mistimes it through square leg
125kph, wide yorker, he jams this out off the toe of the bat
slower ball slips out! A high full toss called a no ball. Peirson half ducked and half pulled, getting it safely behind square
102kph slower ball, he tries to heave over midwicket, it hits the pad and Lalor appeals forgetting it's a free hit! They run a leg bye
105kph, slower ball, Peirson tries to slog sweep but misses outside off
full on middle, he chips a drive back over the bowler's head for two
slog sweep over square leg! They get 173! 98kph, slower ball, maybe too slow, Peirson was waiting, he slog sweeps and nails it!
gorgeous square drive! A wide half volley and Marsh reaches out and flushes it through cover-point
good length, top of off, he defends into the off side, Finch backs up a long way but is sent back
131kph, good length, shaping into middle and leg, he drives with the full face to mid on
glanced fine of a wide shot fine leg! 132kph, half volley swinging into the pads and he glances it fine with ease
glanced wide of short fine this time, Labuschagne slides on his knees and stops it but does he touch the rope while touching the ball? The  TV umpire has a long look. He might be OK. He saved two
good length, 136kph, fourth stump, he tries to square drive on the up but misses
edged just wide of slip! 143kph, full wide outswinger that tailed away late, Finch drove very hard at it, he got a thick edge, Burns dove high to his right and it was just past his right hand!

pinned lbw! Finch's dismal run continues. This was a good length, nipping back in, Finch was only half forward and he got hit on the front shin. Looked plumb. Ball tracking agrees. Hit him in line and was crashing into middle
good length, 139kph, wide of off, he pushes on the up to cover-point
glorious cover-drive! 140kph, half volley. Not the delivery to bowl to Shaun Marsh. He caressed it square of cover. Made a wonderful sound off his blade
short into the hip, 142kph, he got the front leg up and pulled it with control behind square for a couple

huge lbw appeal but it pitched outside leg. Good umpiring. It was a huge appeal because it shot low and was hitting the stumps as he was pinned on the crease. Lesser umpires might have given that but it definitely pitched outside leg
steps outside off and it's fired full at leg and just misses! That could have bowled him because he moved too far across. Rightly not called wide
131kph, length ball wide of off, he slashes off a thick edge that flies fine of third man but Steketee does well
full down leg, he glances and gets a little tickle but it bounces short of Peirson. The keeper couldn't glove it cleanly diving to his left and they pinch one
132kph, good length, middle stump, he defends off the front foot
134kph, full outside off, he drives through cover-point to the sweeper
whipped over forward square and it goes all the way! Angled into the pads, he picks this up with superb timing and flicks it high over square
135kph, full on off, he mistimes a drive in the air towards mid off but it doesn't carry
back of a length, climbing on him, 132kph, Marsh defends awkwardly taking one hand off the bat
top of leg, he defends from the crease
124kph, full outside off, he drives on the up wide of mid off but Laughlin makes a great diving save
140kph, back of a length climbing down leg and it's called wide
pulled over backward square! 134kph, short outside off, it sat up, Harper swivelled and pulled powerfully over square leg. Superb shot
good length, angled into middle, he defends from the crease
good length, top of off, he's squared up, defending to point
back of a length outside off, he's back and gliding this to third man
slower ball, 116kph, angled down leg, he glanced this to fine leg
121kph, full on off, he drove firmly to long on
beaten by a ball that threatened to shape back but nipped away from the left hander
full on leg, he clips this firmly to deep midwicket
shorter leg break, he's back and whipping this through forward square
full toss, he advances to deep cover-point
drilled flat down the ground! Full on middle, he thumped it through the line, flat over the umpire and long off and long on were no chance
faster, fired into leg, he's back and whipping to deep square
shorter leg break, 85kph, he's back and cutting firmly behind backward point
fired into leg, 88kph, he's clipping this straight to midwicket
full on leg, he drives firmly back to the bowler
back of a length on leg, he's back and working to midwicket
back of a length, outside off, he punches off the back foot to deep point
good length, fourth stump, he defends into the off side, Marsh went to run, Harper wisely sent him back
130kph, full outside off, he steps outside off to scoop and gets it off the top edge over the keeper for a couple
full outside off, 134kph, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
wider wrong un outside off, it shot low, he reached out and punched it straight to point
holes out to long off! Tossed up outside off, Marsh took it on trying to launch over long on, but it just drifted away late and he sliced to long off and it was an easy catch. Big wicket for Swepson
slider, shoots low and nearly goes under the bat! He just jammed the bat down
looped up outside off, he drives firmly to long off
tossed up outside off, he drives to long off
shorter length, he's back and forcing to the bowler
back of a length, 133kph, fourth stump, he tries to cut but it's too close and he's beaten
back of a length again, fourth stump, it shoots low and he's beaten again
fuller, 134kph, angled into off, he advances and mistimes it back to the bowler
paddle swept fine! Full and speared into leg, he stepped inside the line and executed the paddle perfectly
steps out and whips this over midwicket! Full on off, he stepped down the track calmly and used the bottom hand to whip it over midwicket
132kph, full on middle, he drives to long on
advances to a 92kph leg break, moves leg side and drives to cover
thumped through cover! 88kph, he skips out and opens his body to smash it forward of point
back of a length, he's back and forcing this to long on
drilled flat down the ground! Full on middle, he swings through line and hammers it flat over the bowler's head and it beat long on
full on leg, he drives to long on
slower, dropping on Harper as he comes down and he whips this firmly to deep midwicket

pulled over deep square leg! Klinger catches while being interviewed! A short ball, Harper swivels and launches this over square leg, Klinger was being interviewed on the boundary, turned around and caught it easily. You never lose it
lofted over cover! Full outside off, he lofts this beautifully over cover to find the rope
full on leg, he works this to deep midwicket to bring up his 50 off 29 balls
back of a length outside off, he punches off the back foot to cover and a misfield allows one
120kph, short ball, he walks down and pulls behind square

sliced straight to point! Sharp catch by Labuschagne! Full outside off, he leaned forward and opened the face to slice it through point in the air but he picked out Labuschagne who was very close and took the catch well
launched over long on! Harper without a helmet or hat on, advanced down the track, he lofted beautifully over long on
top edge straight up! Labuschagne drags down a short ball, Harper tried to hammer it over midwicket, tried to hit it too hard and got a top edge straight up, Peirson got under it and took it easily
wrong un on leg, it runs off pad and rolls into the leg side, they think about a leg bye but Peirson whips out and prevents it
leg break on off, he's forward and pushing to cover
top spinner on off, he's back and pushing to cover
shorter outside off, he's back and defending to point
slower ball outside off, he defends to point
back of a length, outside off, he's back and forcing this through cover
115kph, full outside off, he drives firmly to long off
131kph, angled into middle, he works this to midwicket
fuller outside off, he square drives on the up to deep point
full on middle, 131kph, he drives firmly to deep long on

Is Webster run out?! 83kph, wrong un, he late cuts to short third man, they take on the throw from Bryant and Webster's bat might have plugged and it was a direct hit! He wasn't stretching out. Was his bat on the line? It's so tight. The TV umpire has a long, long, long look. Finally he gives him out! The bat was on the line
wrong un on middle, he defends from the crease
tossed up leg break, he drives getting a thick inside edge through square leg for two
full on off, he drives to long off
pushed through outside leg, round arm type deliver, it hits the pad and drops down
shorter outside leg, he pulls behind square

Laughlin takes a superb catch at mid off! Full outside off, he sets himself and thumps a drive in the air to mid off, he nailed it but it was too flat, no enough elevation, Laughlin on the circle jumps up and plucks it with two hands at full stretch
play and miss outside off driving at a 135kph fuller length wide of off
full outside off, 131kph, he drives to mid off and runs with the stroke
full on off, he drives, mistiming past the bowler for one
thick edge off the toe fine of short third man! The Heat just brought third man up. It was full outside off, he drive and got an edge off the toe and it runs away
full on leg, he clips behind square
thick edge runs fine of short third man! He drives on the up, gets a thick edge fine and runs away
good length, he gets a thick edge onto pad and they pinch one
backs away and laces it through cover! Got a ball in the slot and he smashed a drive on the through the gap
good length on off, he drives but drags it without much timing to mid on
back of a length, 130kph, he pushes this to cover
heaved over square leg! A length ball angled into leg, he was sitting back and just muscled it with the bottom hand over square leg
133kph, full on leg, he swings hard but drags it straight to mid on
thumped over wide mid on! 132kph, length on leg, Imad holds his shape beautifully and swings through the line to crack it over wide mid on

a miscue straight to mid off! Clever slower ball does it. 119kph, slower ball, Imad tried to loft over mid off, he miscued it off the toe of the bat and presented a very easy catch to Burns on the circle
137kph, good length, wide of off, he tries to drive and misses
advances and drives magnificently wide of mid off! What a shot! Charging to a length ball and he crunched it on the up into the gap
full on leg, he clips this straight to short fine
leg break drifts down leg and called wide
shorter leg break, he's back and punching this firmly to cover
shorter wide of off, he's back and cutting firmly to deep point
shorter leg break, top of off, he's back and forcing this to long on
slower and shorter outside off, he cuts firmly but can't beat a diving Labuschagne at cover. Good stop
tossed up, driven firmly to long off

holes out to deep midwicket! He had to go for it. Flatter on off, he tried to slog sweep but got it on the toe of the bat and it went high to deep midwicket but fell about 5 metres short of the rope where Bryant is waiting and he took the catch easily

caught at deep forward square! Bryant moves to the other hot spot on the other side at the start of the new over and takes the catch. Prestwidge got a length ball, he sat back and tried to launch over deep square, he hit it ok but got under it and it fell short of the rope, Bryant runs to his right and takes it well
back of a length, top of middle, he defends from the crease
flicked over square leg! First six in the BBL for Evans! Angled into leg, got the perfect length to pick this up and whip over the square leg rope
caught at short third man! Game over. Steketee responds with a 103kph, slower ball, he charged and swung hard, got a thick edge that sliced off the outside edge to Lynn at short third man. Easy catch
